Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.repository

Interface ContractRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Contract,String>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Contract,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Contract,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Contract,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Contract,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Contract>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Contract,String>
@Repository public interface ContractRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Contract,String>
This interface represents the contract repository, which allows us to perform CRUD operations on contract entities in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createContract

      @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_createContract(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5)", nativeQuery=true) String createContract(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, String provider, int contractType, String building)
      Creates a contract in the database.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the contract.
      endDate - The end date of the contract.
      provider - The provider of the contract.
      contractType - The type of contract.
      building - The building associated with the contract.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created contract.

    • getAllContracts

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getAllContracts", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Contract> getAllContracts()
      Retrieves all contracts from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Contract objects representing all contracts.

    • getContractById

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getContractById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) Contract getContractById(String id)
      Retrieves a contract from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Contract object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getContractByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getContractByProvider(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Contract> getContractByProviderId(String provider, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves contracts associated with a specific provider from the database.
      Parameters:
      provider - The provider of the contracts.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of contracts to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Contract objects associated with the specified provider.

    • countContractByProviderId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countContractByProvider(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int countContractByProviderId(String provider)
      Counts the contracts associated with a specific provider.
      Parameters:
      provider - The provider of the contracts.
      Returns:
      The total number of contracts associated with the specified provider.

    • getContractByCustomerId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_getContractByCustomer(?1, ?2, ?3)", nativeQuery=true) ArrayList<Contract> getContractByCustomerId(String building, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves contracts associated with a specific customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      building - The building associated with the contracts.
      offset - The offset for pagination.
      limit - The maximum number of contracts to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Contract objects associated with the specified customer.

    • countContractByCustomerId

      @Query(value="CALL sp_countContractByCustomer(?1)", nativeQuery=true) int countContractByCustomerId(String id)
      Counts the contracts associated with a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      The total number of contracts associated with the specified customer.

    • updateContract

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_updateContract(?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6)", nativeQuery=true) void updateContract(String id, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, String provider, int contractType, String building)
      Updates the details of a contract in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to update.
      startDate - The updated start date of the contract.
      endDate - The updated end date of the contract.
      provider - The updated provider of the contract.
      contractType - The updated type of contract.
      building - The updated building associated with the contract.

    • deleteContractById

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="CALL sp_deleteContractById(?1)", nativeQuery=true) void deleteContractById(String id)
      Deletes a contract from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the contract to delete.
